question: With reference to the Indian freedom struggle, which one of the following statements is not correct?
option1: The Rowlatt Act aroused a wave of popular indignation and led to the Jallianwala Bagh massacre
option2: Subhas Chandra Bose formed the Forward Bloc
option3: Bhagat Singh was one of the founders of Hindustan Republican Socialist Association
option4: In 1931, the Congress Session at Karachi opposed the Gandhi-Irwin Pact
answer: In 1931, the Congress Session at Karachi opposed the Gandhi-Irwin Pact
explanation: In 1931, the Congress Session at Karachi endorsed (not opposed) Gandhi-Irwin Pact. It was presided over by Vallabh Bhai Patel.
